Package seng202.team5.accessor

Class FlightAccessor

java.lang.Object
seng202.team5.accessor.FlightAccessor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Accessor
public class FlightAccessor
extends java.lang.Object
implements Accessor
FlightAccessor Contains the functions save, update, delete, getData, and dataExists for flights that directly interact with the database. Implements the Accessor interface.

      public FlightAccessor()

  • Method Details

    • save

      public int save​(java.util.List<java.lang.Object> data)
      Creates a flight entry in the database with the given data. Requires the flightID, location type, location code, altitude, latitude, and longitude.
      Specified by:
      save in interface Accessor
      Parameters:
      data - An List containing the data to be inserted into an entry in the database.
      Returns:
      int result The unique id of the flight entry that was just created.

    • update

      public int update​(int id, java.lang.String newLocationType, java.lang.String newLocation, int newAltitude, double newLatitude, double newLongitude)
      Updates a given flight entry with new data. Not every field must be updated.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique id of the given flight entry you want to update.
      newLocationType - The new location type of the flight entry location, one of "APT", "VOR", or "FIX", may be null if not to be updated.
      newLocation - The new location of the flight entry, may be null if not to be updated.
      newAltitude - The new altitude of the flight entry in feet, an integer. May be null if not to be updated.
      newLatitude - The new latitude of the flight entry, a double. Negative is South and positive is North. May be null if not to be updated.
      newLongitude - The new longitude of the flight entry, a double. Negative is West and positive is East. May be null if not to be updated.
      Returns:
      int result The number of rows modified or -1 for error.

    • deleteFlight

      public boolean deleteFlight​(int id)
      Deletes a given flight from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The flight_id of the airline to be deleted.
      Returns:
      boolean result True if the delete operation is successful, False otherwise.

      public boolean delete​(int id)

      Specified by:
      delete in interface Accessor
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      boolean result True if the delete operation is successful, False otherwise.

      Returns:

    • dataExists

      public boolean dataExists​(int id, java.lang.String locationType, java.lang.String location, int altitude, double latitude, double longitude)
      Checks if an identical flight entry exists
      Parameters:
      id - An integer, a flight id.
      locationType - A string, a location type.
      location - A string, a location.
      altitude - An int, the altitude of the flight entry.
      latitude - A double, the latitude of the flight entry.
      longitude - A double, the longitude of the flight entry.
      Returns:
      boolean result True if an identical flight entry exists, False otherwise.
